name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Lawrence E. BRINKMANN, Jr., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Brinkmann

judges: Madame Justice BALDWIN did not participate in this matter.
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Lawrence E. BRINKMANN, Jr., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of March, 2006, upon consideration of the recommendation of the Disciplinary Board dated December 6, 2005, it is hereby
ORDERED that Lawrence E. Brinkmann, Jr., be subjected to public censure by the Supreme Court.
Madame Justice BALDWIN did not participate in this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
897 A.2d 1161
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Lawrence E. BRINKMANN, Jr., Respondent.
No. 1107 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 15, 2006.
